amendatorysection.para: Sections 71-401 to 71-465 shall be known and may be cited as the Health Care Facility Licensure Act.

source.note: The Revisor of Statutes has pursuant to section 49-769 correlated LB849, section 19, with LB999, section 1, to reflect all amendments.
Changes made by LB999 became effective April 15, 2010. Changes made by LB849 became operative July 15, 2010.
